scripts.coverage: pnpm build:go-ffi && (forge coverage || (bash -c "forge coverage 2>&1 | grep -q 'Stack too deep' && echo -e '\033[1;33mWARNING\033[0m: Coverage failed with stack too deep, so overriding and exiting successfully' && exit 0 || exit 1"))
scripts.coverage:lcov: pnpm build:go-ffi && (forge coverage --report lcov || (bash -c "forge coverage --report lcov 2>&1 | grep -q 'Stack too deep' && echo -e '\033[1;33mWARNING\033[0m: Coverage failed with stack too deep, so overriding and exiting successfully' && exit 0 || exit 1"))
scripts.snapshots: forge build && npx tsx scripts/autogen/generate-snapshots.ts && pnpm kontrol-summary && pnpm kontrol-summary-fp
scripts.pre-pr:no-build: pnpm gas-snapshot:no-build && pnpm snapshots && pnpm semver-lock && pnpm autogen:invariant-docs && pnpm lint
scripts.pre-pr: pnpm clean && pnpm build:go-ffi && pnpm build && pnpm pre-pr:no-build
scripts.pre-pr:full: pnpm test && pnpm validate-deploy-configs && pnpm validate-spacers && pnpm pre-pr
